venue.name: Caddy Memorial Park At Wollaston Beach

item.description:
I checked the weather and as of now Monday is sunny with a high around 50. Join the SSFMG for a walk along Wollaston Beach. Since Wollaston is so well lit, we will be fine walking in the dark. Plan on walking 1-1.5 hours. The parking to the end and back is 4 miles.

Also, we have confirmed that the parking lot is open until 9pm, so no worries about the car.

Just remember to dress in layers as it can be windy and cool along the beach.

If you have any questions about this event, please contact me. THANKS!

Wollaston Beach Walk
Monday, March 8th 6pm
Caddy Memorial Park
Quincy Shore Drive
Quincy, MA
(the park by the traffic light ACROSS the street from the beach)

Organizer(s): Julie (let me know if anyone wants to co-organize)

Min/Max: At least 3 Yes RSVPs by 4pm on Monday, March 8th.

Attendance is unlimited.

Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by 4pm on Monday, March 8th

Inclement Weather:
We will walk if it is overcast or there is a slight drizzle. Check back here on Wednesday for an update if the weather is questionable. All Yes RSVPs will be emailed by 4pm if the event is canceled due to the weather.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Directions to Caddy Memorial Park @ Wollaston Beach:

Wollaston Beach can be accessed from many points.

The best way to get to our meeting place is to get off 93N at Exit 8 (Furnace Brook Parkway), exit ramp rotary following small green sign for Furnace Brook Parkway, and follow Furnace Brook Parkway for 2.9 miles.

Furnace Brook Parkway ends at Wollaston Beach, and you take a left onto Quincy Shore Drive.

After only 0.2 (two-tenths) miles, our meeting place comes up on the left.

The parking lot for Caddy Park has a small footbridge and a flag poll that are visible from the main road. Look for the organizers there.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Evening walk at the Beach
